DialogueText: Hello, and Welcome to FBLA! My name is Bartha, am the FBLA President for our chapter, and will help you out.
At FBLA, we focus on service, education, and working on an event so you can win at Nationals.
Is there another player with you?
First off, I'll show you some simple actions to get you started.
To move, press W, A, S, or D.
Nice Job! Now to see what tasks need to be accomplished, press E to open your task box
Look! There is a task for you! You can see the description of the task to the right.
In order to accomplish this task and get ready for region, talk to Mr. Fuller about the different categories.
Mr. Fuller is inside the school. Go to a door and press Q to open it. See if you can find him!
You found Mr. Fuller's classroom! Now walk over to him and press Q.
You are now ready to go to Region!
If you want though, you can not go to region right now and keep working on stuff.
You'll then have a better change of getting a higher ranking.
Nice work! Now it's the other player's turn.
What do you need help with?
Name: Bartha

PossibleResponses.Text: I want the whole new-to-FBLA spill
PossibleResponses.Name: Bartha

DialogueText: You have to figure that out on your own!
But I'll give you a hint: he is on the left side of the hallway
PossibleDialogues.Name: Bartha
